nodes.text: Rescue 3 was a Rescue Boat used by Rescue Flight to free civilians held by the Trade Federation.

Rescue 3 was one of three Rescue Boats chosen to raid Trade Federation prison camps on the Solleu River. Under the protection of Bravo Squadron, Rescue 3 went to its designated camp and picked up all the prisoners there. Rescue 3 then rendezvoused with the rest of Rescue Flight and the group sailed to the Europa Islands. Despite reporting of being low in the water en route, Rescue 3 successfully made the trip to the islands where it delivered its passengers to the freighter Mercatan.
